alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:20PM MST until September 15 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST FOR NAVAJO AND COCONINO COUNTIES... At 319 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near East Sunset Mesa, or 14 miles southwest of Winslow, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... East Sunset Mesa, Jacks Canyon, Sunset Pass, and West Sunset Mesa. This includes the following highways... State Route 87 between mile markers 321 and 334. State Route 99 between mile markers 23 and 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
